message.body: Sounds great. I need your email address, full name and credit card info. If u want to leave it on my voice mail that's fine. Or if u would like me to call you I can. I need the number, expiration date and 3 digit code on the back. The billing address and zip code. If its your parents card I need their info. The comb we use is $15 and there will be a $15 travel fee, that $30 goes directly to Raquel by check or cash. Let me know if that's an issue. -Merav
Shoot. I do. Sorry . I will try her first.
Do you have Raquel's number? She's not here yet...
Feel free to give her a call for a more definite time.

Merav, I'll call you in a little. Thanks for following up!!!! Raquel was great, she did a great job! My roommate checked me this afternoon and she only found four nits! Which is amazing, considering yesterday we were finding four every other strand. This has been a nightmare, I'm not sure what I would have done if you hadnt sent Raquel to check me... Probably would have lice for a lot longer. Thanks.
